about.title: About
about.subtitle: Building a brighter future for children across Ethiopia, one family at a time.
about.mission: At BeNovaBaby, we believe that the earliest years of a child's life are the most powerful in shaping who they become. We are a purpose-driven company based in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, committed to helping parents and caregivers support the growth and development of children aged 0–5.
about.principle: Our work is grounded in one guiding principle: Every child deserves a strong, supported start in life.
about.together: Together, we can shape a brighter start for every child.

about.about.title: Our Story
about.about.subtitle: Empowering Early Childhood Development in Ethiopia
about.about.mission: At BeNovaBaby, our mission is to provide comprehensive support for early childhood development in Ethiopia. We believe that every child deserves a strong, supported start in life.
about.about.principle: We are dedicated to creating a nurturing environment where children can thrive, learn, and grow to their fullest potential.
about.about.together: Together, we can build a brighter future for Ethiopia's children.

testimonials.firstTestimony: BeNova Baby offers expert advice, useful tools, and supportive community. I highly recommend it to parents nurturing their child’s development.
testimonials.secondName: Dr. Henok Tadesse, Child Development Specialist
testimonials.secondTestimony: The platform bridges the gap between clinical advice and everyday parenting. It empowers caregivers with practical insights while keeping the child’s well-being at the center.
testimonials.thirdTestimony: BeNova Baby is a valuable extension of what we aim to do in early learning environments. Their tools and expert sessions give parents the confidence and knowledge to support their child’s development beyond the classroom.

name.secondName: Dr. Henok Tadesse, Child Development Specialist
